articles.title: Manika Batra Left Out of India Squad for Asian TT Championships - News18
articles.description: Star paddler Manika Batra was on Wednesday left out of the India squad for the Asian Championships beginning September 28 in Doha after she did not attend the mandatory national camp in Sonepat.
